text: Mohammad Dabir Moghaddam () is an Iranian linguist and professor at Allameh Tabatabaee University and a permanent member of Academy of Persian Language and Literature.http://www.isna.ir/news/91113018330/محمد دبیرمقدم: هرگونه دخل‌وتصرف در خط فارسی عیب دارد He was also the recipient of Iranian Science and Culture Hall of Fame award in 2010. == References == Category:1953 births Category:Linguists from Iran Category:Linguists of Iranian languages Category:Living people Category:Allameh Tabataba'i University faculty
title: Mohammad Dabir Moghaddam
